sentences.sentence: Work on the bridge will recommence next month.
sentences.translation: 下个月将重新开始这座桥的建造工作。

sentences.sentence: The two countries agreed to recommence talks the following week.
sentences.translation: 两国同意于随后的一周重新开始会谈。

sentences.sentence: His course at Howard University will not recommence until next year.
sentences.translation: 他在哈佛大学的课程直到明年才重新开始。
